summary.p: Increases or decreases the contrast of an image.

p.i: This effect is new in the Universal Windows Platform. It is not supported on Windows 8.1 or Phone 8.1.
Supported by Win2D but not Windows.UI.Composition.

remarks.p: The contrast function modifies each color channel value using two piecewise quadratic polynomials that meet with slope continuity at the point (0.5, 0.5).

Effect inputs and outputs are assumed to be in premultiplied alpha format, but this effect operates internally on straight alpha data, so its input values will be unpremultiplied, then the contrast adjustment applied, and finally the result converted back to premultiplied format.
This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Contrast effect.
